name: Cozy Token
description: Cozy Token (COZY) is the native utility token of CozySwap, a decentralized exchange (DEX) powered by Plasma Chain. It is designed to support liquidity pools, staking, governance, and community-driven development.
disclaimer: Cozy Token (COZY) is a decentralized digital asset with no central entity ownership. Users should conduct their own research (DYOR) before interacting with any smart contracts or decentralized applications associated with CozySwap.
